```{r load_packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE} 
library(dplyr)
library(fontawesome)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square", fill = "steelblue"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-square", fill = "steelblue"))

wk_post <- tibble(
"Qualtrics?" = c(unchecked),

"eCampus?" = c(unchecked),

Description = c("Watch a two-part walkthrough on how to use spacing and colors in Qualtrics."),

Location = c("[Link](/example/07-example/#using-the-qualtrics-api-1)")
)
```

### What's Due?

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
kable(wk_post, 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'ccll') %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "30em") %>%
  column_spec(4, width = "10em")
```
